triples.name: Markov decision process
triples.relevance: The paper proposes constrained variants and unified approaches for MDPs with countable state spaces.

triples.name: Linear programming
triples.relevance: The paper reduces the control problem to an infinite linear programming formulation.

triples.name: Lagrange multiplier
triples.relevance: The paper presents a Lagrangian approach for sensitivity analysis in constrained MDPs.

triples.name: Sensitivity analysis
triples.relevance: The paper obtains sensitivity analysis results for the constrained control problem.

triples.name: Expected value
triples.relevance: The paper studies expected average cost and expected total cost objectives.

triples.name: Discounted cash flow
triples.relevance: The paper considers discounted cost as a special case of expected total cost.

triples.name: Countable set
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on MDPs with a countable state space.
